definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Please find the inverse function and sketch.
Counter functions provide frequency and time interval measurements.
sentences.chinese: 反函數提供頻率和時間間隔的測量。

sentences.english: This can be easily solved by using an inverse function amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 採用反函數放大器就可以解決這個問題。
